name: Shadow's Bullet
storyline:
An abandonned subway station as your playground

A pool of 17 maps.

Flickering lights and oncoming trains will throw you out of hiding when you least expect it.

Even if you are invisible, some objects littering the ground might interact with you, giving away your position.
summary: Shadow's Bullet is a top-down, local multiplayer arena game, ranging from 2 to 4 players sharing the same screen, and fighting each other through rounds to get the highest score. In this twin-stick game, each player takes the control of an invisible character whose cloak will only wear off when aiming, shooting, rolling or when exposed to bright lights.
